messages.title: Putting local people first
messages.content: Sid will put the interests of his constituents first.

messages.title: Listening to local residents
messages.content: Sid pledges to be available and accessible, listen to residents' concerns, and represent their views in Parliament.

messages.title: Against the 3rd Runway
messages.content: Sid opposes the third runway at Heathrow as it affects local residents and promises action against it.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Sid advocates for proper funding for all schools to ensure high standards of teaching.
Committed to defending the NHS and ensuring access to services seven days a week.
Sid aims to reduce traffic, address traffic-related pollution, and ensure reliable public transport.
Promises genuinely affordable housing, support for renters and help for first-time buyers.
Plans to support local businesses and create jobs.

issues.economy: Plans to support local businesses and create jobs.
issues.education: Proper funding for all schools to ensure high standards of teaching.
issues.health: Defending the NHS and ensuring access to services seven days a week.

housing.content: Promises genuinely affordable housing, support for renters and help for first-time buyers.

leaflet.personalStatement: Sid cares deeply for Uxbridge & South Ruislip and will always put constituents first.

endorsements.endorser: Name not clear enough to extract
endorsements.endorsement: Sid is the best person to represent us.

quotes.text: "I will put the interests of my constituents first."
